translation.en: On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each.
translation.yo: Àwọn onímọ̀ ìjìnlẹ̀ sáyẹ̀nsì láti ilé ìkẹ́ẹ̀kọ́ gíga ti ìsègun Stanford lọ́jọ́ ajé ti kéde ìdásílẹ̀ irinṣẹ́ ìwádìí tuntun tí ó le tó nǹkan lẹ́sẹẹsẹ pẹ̀lú bí wọ́n bá se rí: irinṣẹ́ kéreké tí a lè tẹ̀ jáde pẹ̀lú lílo irinṣẹ́ ìtẹ̀wé ìgbàlódé pẹ̀lú owó ẹyọ fún ọ̀kọ̀ọ̀kan.

translation.en: Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.
translation.yo: Olùwádìí àgbà sọ pé èyí le è tètè mú kí wọn tètè mọ nípa jẹjẹrẹ, ikọ́ fee HIV, àti ibà lára àwọn aláàrẹ̀ ni àwọn orílẹ̀ èdè tí kòní owó púpọ̀, ní ibi tí àwọn tí wọ́n ń borí àìsàn bíì jẹjẹrẹ ọyàn jẹ bí ìlàjì àwọn olówó ní ìlú náà.

translation.en: The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights.
translation.yo: Jas 39C lọ kọlu ibi tí ènìyàn ma ń gbà ní ago mẹsán àbọ̀ (0230 UTC) ó sì jọ́nà, tó sì ti àwọn ọkọ̀ òfuruf;u pa.

translation.en: The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee.
translation.yo: Won da Olori Skwodroni. Dilokrit Pattavee gege bi awako ofururu.

translation.en: Local media reports an airport fire vehicle rolled over while responding.
translation.yo: Ilé isé oníròyìn abẹ́lé́ fi síta wípé ọkọ̀ panápaná ilé isé ọkọ̀ òfuurufú subú nígbà tí o ń sisẹ́.

translation.en: 28-year-old Vidal had joined Barça three seasons ago, from Sevilla.
translation.yo: Fidali, omo odun-28 ti darapọ̀ mọ́ ẹgbẹ́ agbáboolu Basilona ní àkókò ìdíjé méta sẹ́yin, láti Sefila.

translation.en: Since moving to the Catalan-capital, Vidal had played 49 games for the club.
translation.yo: Lati igba ti o ti re koja si olu-ilu Catalan, Vidal ti ko pa ninu idije mokandinlaadota fun egbe agbabolu re.

translation.en: The protest started around 11:00 local time (UTC+1) on Whitehall opposite the police-guarded entrance to Downing Street, the Prime Minister's official residence.
translation.yo: Ìflrúnú hàn bẹ̀rẹ̀ ní ago mọ́kànlá (UTC+1) ní Whitehall ní wájú ẹnu ọ̀nà ilé iṣẹ́ ọlọ́pàá sí òpópónà Downing, ilé àrẹ orílẹ̀ èdè.

translation.en: Just after 11:00, protesters blocked traffic on the northbound carriage in Whitehall.
translation.yo: Ní kété lẹ́yìn agogo mọ́kànlá, àwọn tó ń fi èhónú hàn dí ojú pópónà ọ̀nà tóbá àríwá jádé ní gbòngàn funfun.

translation.en: At 11:20, the police asked the protesters to move back on to the pavement, stating that they needed to balance the right to protest with the traffic building up.
translation.yo: Ní aago mọ́kànlá kọjá ogún ìsẹ́jù, iléeṣẹ́ ọlọ́ọ̀pá tí ní káwọn olùsèfẹ̀hónúhàn sún sẹ́yìn, sọ pé wọ́n nílò láti sètò ìfẹ̀hónúhàn pẹ̀lú súnkẹrẹ fàkẹrẹ tó ń kó jọ.

translation.en: Around 11:29, the protest moved up Whitehall, past Trafalgar Square, along the Strand, passing by Aldwych and up Kingsway towards Holborn where the Conservative Party were holding their Spring Forum in the Grand Connaught Rooms hotel.
translation.yo: Ní nǹkan bí i aago mọ́kànlá kọjá ìṣẹ́jú mọ́kàndínlọ́gbọ̀n, ìfẹ̀hónù dé Whitehall, kọjá Trafalgar lójú ọ̀nà èbúté, kọjá Aldwych ó tún lọ sí òkè Kingsway lójúọ̀nà Holborn níbití ẹgbẹ́ Conservative ti ń se ètò ọlọ́dọọdún láwọn yàrá ilé ìtura ńlá Grand Connaught .

translation.en: Nadal's head to head record against the Canadian is 7–2.
translation.yo: Nadal sàkọọ́lẹ̀ ìforígbárí o ní àmì méje sóódo pẹ̀lú ilẹ̀ Canada.

translation.en: He recently lost against Raonic in the Brisbane Open.
translation.yo: Laipe yi o padanu si Raoniki ni ere Sisi Brisbeni.

translation.en: Nadal bagged 88% net points in the match winning 76 points in the first serve.
translation.yo: Nadal ní àmì ayò 88% ní bọ́ọ̀lù náà tó sì gba àmì ayò 76 ní abala àkọ́kọ́.

translation.en: After the match, King of Clay said, "I am just excited about being back in the final rounds of the most important events. I am here to try to win this."
translation.yo: Lẹ́yìn ìdìje, Ọba Clay ní “inú mi dùn láti padà sínú ìdíje tó gbẹ̀yìn àwọn ètò ńlá. Mo wá láti gbìyànjú kí n lè jẹri.”

translation.en: "Panama Papers" is an umbrella term for roughly ten million documents from Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, leaked to the press in spring 2016.
translation.yo: “Pépà Panama” jẹ́ bí àkójọ ọ̀rọ̀ fún àwọn ìwé mílíọ̀nù mẹ́wàá láti iléeṣẹ́ òfin Panama Mossack Fonseca, èyí tó hàn de fáwọn oníròyìn lọ́dun 2016.

translation.en: The documents showed fourteen banks helped wealthy clients hide billions of US dollars of wealth to avoid taxes and other regulations.
translation.yo: Awon iIwe naa fihan ile ifowopamo merinla to ran awon onisowo olola pa ilopo bilioni owo Amerika mo lati le sa fun owo ori ati awon ofin miin.

translation.en: British newspaper The Guardian suggested Deutsche Bank controlled roughly a third of the 1200 shell companies used to accomplish this.
translation.yo: Ìwé ìròyìn Ilẹ̀ gẹ̀ẹ́sì The Guardian da lábàá pé kí ilé ìfowópama Deutsche darí ìdámkta ti àwọn ilé iṣk shell tó tó 1200 tí wọ́n lò láti jẹ́ kí èyí ṣe é ṣe.

translation.en: There were protests worldwide, several criminal prosecutions, and the leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan both resigned.
translation.yo: Ìfẹ̀hónúhàn wáyé káàkiri àgbáyé, ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ ìbánijẹ́jọ́ ọ̀daràn áti àwọn òlórí ìjọba Iceland àti Pakistan kọ̀wé fìposílè.

translation.en: Born in Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and once held an American permanent resident "green card".
translation.yo: A bi ni Hong Kong. Ma kẹkọ ni ile iwe giga New York ati ile ẹkọ imọ ofin Harvard bẹẹni o si fi igba kan ni iwe igbelu Ameria “kaadi alawọ ewe”.

translation.en: Hsieh implied during the election that Ma might flee the country during a time of crisis.
translation.yo: Hsieh fi soro nigba ibo pe ma le sa kuro ninu ilu nigba wahala.

translation.en: Hsieh also argued that the photogenic Ma was more style than substance.
translation.yo: Hsieh náà jiyàn pé Ma tó má n rẹwà nínú àwòrán jẹ́ àṣà ju oge lọ.

translation.en: Despite these accusations, Ma won handily on a platform advocating closer ties with the Chinese mainland.
translation.yo: Pẹ̀lú pẹ̀lú àwọn ẹ̀sùn tí wọ́n fi kan an Ma yege dada lori itage ti o já fún ìbálòpọ̀ fini fini pẹ̀lú òkè odò Ṣáínà.

translation.en: Today's Player of the Day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals.
translation.yo: Agbábọ̀lù Tòní ní Alex Overchkin ti Washington Capitals.

translation.en: He had 2 goals and 2 assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers.
translation.yo: Ó gbá góòlù 2, asisti 2 ni eré tí Wọ́ṣíntíni ti borí àwọn Trasha Atlanta pẹ̀lú 5-3.

translation.en: Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom;
translation.yo: Ìrànwọ́ alẹ́ àkọ́kọ́ Ovechkin nínú ìborí ẹrẹ́ ibi-afẹ́dẹ́ nípasẹ̀ rookie Nicklas Backstrom;

translation.en: his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, becoming the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux each reached that milestone.
translation.yo: àmì ayo rẹ̀ kejì ní alé nàà ní ọgọ́ta rẹ ní abala yẹn,tó jẹ́ òṣèrè àkọ́kọ́ ;tó ma gba ọgọ́ta tàbí jù bẹ́ẹ̀ lọ ní abala náà láti 1995-96,nígbàtí Jagr àti Mario Lemieux dé ìpèle tó ní àmì.

translation.en: Batten was ranked 190th on the 2008 400 Richest Americans list with an estimated fortune of $2.3 billion.
translation.yo: Wọ́n fún Batten ní ipò 190th ní ọdún 2008. nínu àwọn Olówó tó lówó jù ní Amẹ́ríkà 400 pẹ̀lú ìṣirò ọrọ̀ tó tó $2.3 billion.

translation.en: He graduated from the College of Arts & Sciences of the University of Virginia in 1950 and was a significant donor to that institution.
translation.yo: O keko jade ni eka ti ise owo ati imo sayensi ni ile iwe giga Virginia ni odun 1950 o si je olugbeowosile ti o se koko si ile iwe naa.

translation.en: Iraq's Abu Ghraib prison has been set alight during a riot.
translation.yo: Wọ́n ti dánilá sun Ilé ẹ̀wọ̀n Abu Ghraib ti ilẹ̀ Iraq nígba rọ̀gbọ̀dìyàn.

translation.en: The jail became notorious after prisoner abuse was discovered there after US forces took over.
translation.yo: A wa mọ ẹ̀wọ̀n náà lẹ́yìn tí wọ́n wariri inita àwọn ëlẹ́wọ̀n níbẹ̀ nígbàtí awon ajagun Amerika gbàkóso.

translation.en: Piquet Jr. crashed in the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix just after an early pit stop for Fernando Alonso, bringing out the safety car.
translation.yo: Akopa Piquet Jr, fi idi remi ninu idije ti 2008 Singapore Grand Prix ni kete ti won se afihan oko Fernando Alonso tan, eyi ti o gbe oko aabo jade.

translation.en: As the cars ahead of Alonso went in for fuel under the safety car, he moved up the pack to take victory.
translation.yo: Bí àwọn mótò tó ṣájú Alonso lọsí mọ́tò àbò fún epo, ni oun ń gòkè ìṣẹ́gun lọ.

translation.en: Piquet Jr. was sacked after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.
translation.yo: Piquet Jr. ní ìdádúró lẹ́nu iṣẹ́ lẹ́yìn idíje ọ́lọ̀kọ̀ wíwà Hungaria 2009.

translation.en: At exactly 8:46 a.m. a hush fell across the city, marking the exact moment the first jet struck its target.
translation.yo: Ni 8:46 a.m. gangan, idakeje kan ba le ilu, lati sami si akoko ti ọkọ ofurufu akọkọ ba afojusun rẹ.

translation.en: Two beams of light have been rigged up to point skywards overnight.
translation.yo: Won ti tan oju ina meji ki o ran de ina oju orun moju.

translation.en: Construction is ongoing for five new skyscrapers at the site, with a transportation center and memorial park in the middle.
translation.yo: Iṣẹ́ ìkọlé ń lọ lọ́wọ́ fún àwọn ilé gogoro alárànbarà titun márùn-ún ní ojúlé, un ni ojule, pẹ̀lú ibùdó ìrìnà ọkọ̀ àti ibùdó ìrántí láàrin.

translation.en: The PBS show has more than two-dozen Emmy awards, and its run is shorter only than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood.
translation.yo: Ètò PBS ní tó àmì ẹ̀yẹ Emmy tó lé ní dọ́sìnì méjì, Ó sì ma ń kéré jú òpópónà Sesame àti agbègbè ọ̀gbẹ́ni Rogers lọ.

translation.en: Each episode of the show would focus on a theme in a specific book and then explore that theme through multiple stories.
translation.yo: Ìkọ̀ọ̀kan ẹ́písòòdù yìí yó ò fojúsun àkórí nínú ìwé kan pàtó, tí a ó sì má a sàmúnlò àwọn àkórí yìí nípa lílo ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ ìtàn.

translation.en: Each show would also provide recommendations for books that children should look for when they went to their library.
translation.yo: Àfihàn kọ̀ọ̀kan náà yíò tún gba àwọn ọmọ ní ìmòràn lórí àwọn ìwé láti múlò tí wọn bá lọ sí yàrá ìkàwẹ́.

translation.en: John Grant, from WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home station) said "Reading Rainbow taught kids why to read,... the love of reading — [the show] encouraged kids to pick up a book and to read."
translation.yo: Johanu Granti, lati WNED Bufalo (o n ka oju redio ile Osumo) wipe “Kika Osumo ko awon omode idi ti o ye ki won fi kawe,...ife iwe - [ere naa] fisokan aawon omode lati gbe iwe ka..”

translation.en: It is believed by some, including John Grant, that both the funding crunch and a shift in the philosophy of educational television programming contributed to ending the series.
translation.yo: Àwọn kan gbàgbọ́, pẹ̀lú john Grant, pé àti funding crunch àti sísún ní ẹ̀kọ́ ìmòye ètò orí amóhùnmáwòrán dási láti parí eré náà.

translation.en: The storm, situated about 645 miles (1040 km) west of the Cape Verde islands, is likely to dissipate before threatening any land areas, forecasters say.
translation.yo: Iji naa, eyi ti o wa ni iwon bata bi 645 (ibuso 1040) iwo oorun petele Cape Verde, oseese ki o poora ki o to se ijamba ni agbegbe naa gege bi awon onwoye se wi.

translation.en: Fred currently has winds of 105 miles per hour (165 km/h) and is moving towards the northwest.
translation.yo: Fred ń sáré ní máìlì 105 ní wákàtí (165km/h) ó sì ń lọ sí apá àríwá ìwọ̀ oòrùn.

translation.en: Fred is the strongest tropical cyclone ever recorded so far south and east in the Atlantic since the advent of satellite imagery, and only the third major hurricane on record east of 35°W.
translation.yo: Fred jẹ́ ẹni tó lé wẹ́ nínu ìjì òjò tó sì lágbára jù ní gúsù àti ìla oòrùn ní Atlantic láti ìgbà tí wọ́n ti dá àwòrán sátẹ́láìtì sílẹ̀, àti pé ìjì líle tó lágbára kẹta ní a ti sàkọsílẹ̀ rẹ̀ ní ìla oòrùn 35°W.

translation.en: On September 24, 1759, Arthur Guinness signed a 9,000 year lease for the St James' Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ireland.
translation.yo: Ní ọjọ́ Kẹrìnlélógún, oṣù kẹsàn án ọdún 1759, ni Arthur Guinness fọwọ́ sí fífí St James' Gate Brewery ni Dublin, Ireland, sílẹ̀ fún yíya fún 9,000 ọdú.

translation.en: 250 years later, Guinness has grown to a global business that turns over 10 billion euros (US$14.7 billion) every year.
translation.yo: Iléeṣẹ́ Guinness ti dàràbà nínú okoòwò àgbáyé lẹ́yìn ọ̀tàlénígba ó dín mẹ́wàá ọdún tí ó sì ti mún bílíọ̀nù mẹ́wàá euro (bílíọ̀nù mẹ́rìnlá ó lé ẹ̀dẹ́gbẹ̀rin mílíọ̀nù dọ́là) lọ́dọdún.

translation.en: Jonny Reid, co-driver for the A1GP New Zealand team, today made history by driving the fastest over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, legally.
translation.yo: Jonny Reid tó jẹ́ alájọwà fún ikọ̀ A1GP New Zealand lónìí sàkọọ́lẹ̀ ìtàn nípa yíyára wakọ̀ ju Auckland Harbour Bridge ẹni ọdún méjìdínláàdọ́ta ti ilẹ̀ New Zealand níbàmún un pẹ̀lú òfin.

translation.en: Mr Reid managed to drive the New Zealand's A1GP car, Black Beauty at speeds over 160km/h seven times over the bridge.
translation.yo: Ogbeni Reidi sa agbara lati wa oko A1GP ti Silandi Titun, Arewa Dudu sare gori afara naa ni ilopo meje ju 160km/h.

translation.en: The New Zealand police had trouble using their speed radar guns to see how fast Mr Reid was going because of how low Black Beauty is, and the only time the police managed to clock Mr Reid was when he slowed down to 160km/h.
translation.yo: Àwọn ọlọ́pàá ilẹ̀ New Zealand ní ìṣòro lílo ìbọn speed radar wọn láti rí bí Ọ̀gbẹ́ni Reid ṣe ń sáré tó, nítorí bí ẹwà ẹ̀nìyàn dudu ti ri, ẹ̀ẹ̀kan soso tí àwọn ọlọ́pàá yóò rí bí Ọgbẹ́ni Reid ṣe ń sáré sí ni ìgbà tí Ó sinmi díẹ̀, èyi ni ọgọ́ta kìlómíta láàrin wákàtí.

translation.en: In the last 3 months, over 80 arrestees were released from the Central Booking facility without being formally charged.
translation.yo: Láàrin oṣù mẹ́ta tó kọjá, àwọn bí i ọgọ́rin tí wọ́n fi páńpẹ́ òfin gbé ni wọ́n ti dásílẹ̀ kúrò ní ọgbà Central Booking láláì fojú balé ẹjọ́.

translation.en: In April this year, a temporary restaining order was issued by Judge Glynn against the facility to enforce the release of those held more than 24 hours after their intake who did not receive a hearing by a court commissioner.
translation.yo: Nínú osù kẹrin ọdún yí adájó Glynn pa àṣę ìkánilọ́wọ́kò onígbàkanná pé kí ilé iṣẹ́ náà tú àwọn tí wọ́n tí dè mọ́lẹ̀ fún wákàtí mẹ́rìnlélógún sílẹ̀ lẹ́yìn tí wọ́n gbà wọ́n sọ́dọ̀ tí wọn ò dę rí ìdájọ́ gbà láti ọ̀dọ̀ kọmíṣọ́nà kọ́ọ̀tú.

translation.en: The commissioner sets bail, if granted, and formalizes the charges filed by the arresting officer. The charges are then entered into the state's computer system where the case is tracked.
translation.yo: Kọmíṣíọ́nà se àgbékalẹ̀ owó ìtanràn, tí ó bá bọ́ si, tí ó sì fì ẹ̀sùn tí agbófinró fi kàn múnlẹ̀. Ẹ̀sùn náà ni ó gbé wọnú ẹ̀rọ ayárabíàsá ìpínlẹ̀ tíwọ́n ti ń taná wádìí ẹ̀sùn náà.

translation.en: The hearing also marks the date for the suspect’s right to a speedy trial.
translation.yo: Ìgbẹ́jọ́ náa sàmí ẹ̀tọ́ afurasí sí ṣíṣe ęjọ́ ní kíá kíá.

translation.en: Peter Costello, Australian treasurer and the man most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as Liberal party leader has thrown his support behind a nuclear power industry in Australia.
translation.yo: Peter Costello, alákòso ìsúra orílè-èdè Australia tí o si jẹ ẹni tó sẹẹsẹẹ láti gbàjọba lówó adarí ìgbìmò ìjọba John Howard gẹ́gẹ́ bi adarí ẹgbẹ´ oẹlómìnira tí àtíléyìn hán sí ilẹ́ isẹ́ àdó olóró ní Australia.

translation.en: Mr Costello said that when nuclear power generation becomes economically viable, Australia should pursue its use.
translation.yo: Arákùnrin Costello sọ wípé bí ìran alágbára ohun ìjagun apanirun bá di kòseémàní ọrọ̀ ajé, ó yẹ kí ilẹ̀ Australia lè gbá tẹ̀le ìlò rẹ̀.

translation.en: "If it becomes commercial, we should have it. That is, there's no in-principle objection to nuclear energy" Mr Costello said.
translation.yo: “Tí ó bá di ti ọrọ̀ ajé, ó yẹ ká ní i. Ìyẹn ni pé, kò si ilòdì sí òfin ìpìlẹ̀ si ìdínkù agbára bi arákùnrin” Costello ṣe sọ.

translation.en: According to Ansa, "police were concerned by a couple of top-level hits they feared might spark a full-blown war of succession.
translation.yo: Bí Ansa ṣe sọ́,“Àwọn ọlọ́pà bẹ̀rẹ̀ àwọn ọgá nítorí ó lè di ogun.

translation.en: Police said Lo Piccolo had the upper hand because he had been Provenzano's right-hand man in Palermo and his greater experience won him the respect of the older generation of bosses as they pursued Provenzano's policy of keeping as low as possible while strengthening their power network.
translation.yo: Àwọn olopa wípé Lo Piccolo ní ànfàní torípé òhun ló jẹ́ amúngbálẹ́gbẹ̀ẹ́ Provenzano ni Palermo béèni iriri rẹ̀ tó jùlọ múu kí àwọn àgbààgbà bọ̀wọ̀ fun, bí wọn ṣe n tẹ́lẹ̀ òfin Provenzano láti mún àdínkù bá bí èèyàn ṣe ń sokùn agbára sí.

translation.en: These bosses had been reined in by Provenzano when he put an end to the Riina-driven war against the state that claimed the lives of Mafia crusaders Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."
translation.yo: Profenasano ti kapa awon oga yi nigba ti o pari ogun ilu ti Riina sokunfa, to gba emi awon alagbamu Mafia Gifani Falkoni ati Paolo Boselino ni 1992.”

translation.en: Apple CEO Steve Jobs unveiled the device by walking onto the stage and taking the iPhone out of his jeans pocket.
translation.yo: Olùdásílẹ̀ ilé iṣẹ́ Apple Steve Jobs ti ṣí aṣọ lójú eégún ẹ̀rọ tuntun, nípa yíyọ iPhone náà jáde nínú àpò ṣòkòtò rẹ̀ nígbà it́ o gun orí ìtàgé.

translation.en: During his 2 hour speech he stated that "Today Apple is going to reinvent the phone, We are going to make history today".
translation.yo: Nígbàtí ó n sọ̀rọ̀ fún wákàtí méjì o wípe “Apu máa tún ẹ̀rọ ìbánisọ̀rọ̀ ṣe. A ma dìtà.

translation.en: Brazil is the largest Roman Catholic country on Earth, and the Roman Catholic Church has consistently opposed the legalization of same-sex marriage in the country.
translation.yo: Brazil jẹ orílẹ̀-èdè ìlú ìjọ ẹlẹ́sin Róòmù tó pọ̀jù lọ làgbáyé, bẹ́ẹ̀ sì ní ìjọ ẹlẹ́sìn Róòmù tako ìgbéyàwó akọ pẹ̀lú akọ tàbí abo pẹ̀lú abo .

translation.en: The National Congress of Brazil has debated legalization for 10 years, and such civil marriages are currently only legal in Rio Grande do Sul.
translation.yo: Àpérò àpapọ̀ orílẹ̀èdè Brazil ti jíròrò lórí ìlànà òfin fún ọdún mẹ́wàá àti pé irú ìgbéyàwó ìlú yìí ní ó bá òfin mun ní Rio Grande do Sul.

translation.en: The original bill was drafted by former mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. The proposed legislation, after being amended, is now in the hands of Roberto Jefferson.
translation.yo: Olórí ìlú tẹ́lẹ̀ Mata Suplicy ló kọ òfin náà. Òfin tówàlọ́nà náà ti wà lọ́wọ́ Robato Jefasini, lẹ́yìn tí wọ́n ṣàtúnṣe sí.

translation.en: Protesters hope to collect a petition of 1.2 million signatures to present to the National Congress in November.
translation.yo: Àwọn afẹ̀hohnúhàn lérò láti gba ìfọwọ́bọ̀wé tó tó 1.2 miliọnu láti fi ṣọwọ́ sí àpérò orílẹ̀èdè ni oṣu kejìl.

translation.en: After it became apparent that many families were seeking legal help to fight the evictions, a meeting was held on March 20 at the East Bay Community Law Center for the victims of the housing scam.
translation.yo: Lẹ́yìn tó hàn gbangba pé ọ̀pọ̀ àwọn ìdílé ń wá ìrànlọ́wọ́ òfin láti dojúkọ lílé jáde , ìpàdé kàn wáyé ní ogúnjọ́ oṣù kẹta ní ibùdó òfin ni agbègbè ìlà-Òòrùn ìyáwó omi òkun sínú ilé.

translation.en: When the tenants started sharing what had occurred to them, most of the families involved suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson of the OHA had stolen their security deposits, and skipped out of town.
translation.yo: Nigbati awon olugbe bere sini pin iriri won, pupo ninu awon molebi ti o ni ipin nibe ri wipe Carolyn Wilson ti OHA ti ji ipin aabo idogo won, o si sa lo kuro ni ilu.

translation.en: Tenants at Lockwood Gardens believe that there may be another 40 families or more to face eviction, since they learned that OHA police are also investigating other public housing properties in Oakland that may be caught up in the housing scam.
translation.yo: Àwọn ayalégbé ní Ọgbà Lockwood gbàgbọ wípé àwọn ìdílé ogójì míràn ma dojuko lilejade, níwọ̀n tí wọn gbọ wípé àwọn Ọlọpa OHA naa ń sẹ iwádìí àwọn ohùn ìní ilé gbogbo míràn tí o seese kí wọn ni irírí ètẹ ìtànje ilé.

translation.en: The band canceled the show at Maui's War Memorial Stadium, which was set to be attended by 9,000 people, and apologized to fans.
translation.yo: Àwọn ẹlẹ́gbẹ́ orin fagilé ìpàdé orin wọ́n ní pápá ìṣeré Maui War Memorial, eléyìí tó yẹ kí àwọn ènìyàn 9000 wá, wọ́n sí rá ws ẹ̀bl sí àwọn olólùfẹ́ wọn.

translation.en: The band's management company, HK Management Inc., gave no initial reason when they canceled on September 20, but blamed logistical reasons by the next day.
translation.yo: Ile ise ti o n se amojuto eto, Hk Management Inc, ko so idi pataki ti won fi fagi le september 20, sugbon won kede ebi lori ailese amojuto bi o se ye ni ojo keji.

translation.en: The famous Greek lawyers, Sakis Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos have been imprisoned in the Athens' jail of Korydallus, as they were found guilty of graft and corruption.
translation.yo: Wọ́n ti ti gbajúgbajà amòfin ilẹ Greek, Sakis Kechagioglou àti George Nikolakopoulos mọ́ àhámọ́ ọgbà ẹ̀wọ̀n Korydallus ti Athens, níbí wọ́n se ní wọ́n jẹ̀bi ẹ̀sùn ìwà jẹgúdújẹrá àti àjẹbánu.

translation.en: As a result of this, a big scandal within the Greek legal community has been raised through the exposure of illegal actions that judges, lawyers, solicitors and attorneys have done during the previous years.
translation.yo: Fún ìdí èyí,wọ́n ti se àgbéga ìbanilórúkọjẹ́ ńlá tó wáyé láàrin ìlú Greek látara ìlàlójú sáwọn ìwà tí kò bófin mun táwọn adájọ́, agbẹ́jọ́rò, alágbàwí, àtàwọn amòfin ti hù láwọn ọdún tó ti kọjá sẹ́yìn.

translation.en: A few weeks ago, after the information published by the journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos in his popular Television show "Zoungla" in Alpha TV, the member of Parliament and lawyer, Petros Mantouvalos was abdicated as members of his office had been involved in illegal graft and corruption.
translation.yo: Ní ọ̀sẹ̀ díè sẹ́yìn, lẹyìn ìròyìn tí akọròyìn Makis Triantafylopoulos sẹ àtèjádẹ rẹ nínú gbajúgbajà àfihàn tẹlifísàn “Zoungla” ní Alpha TV, ọmọ ẹgbé ilẹ́ ìgbimọ̀ asòfin àti agbẹjórò, Petros Mantouvalos gba ìdáláre bi àwọn ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ míràn nínú ofiisi rẹ se lọ́wọ́ nínú ìwà ìbàjẹ́ àti ìlòdì sófin.

translation.en: Moreover, top judge Evangelos Kalousis is imprisoned as he found guilty of corruption and degenerate behaviour.
translation.yo: Síwájú si, adájọ́ gíga Kalousis ti wà lẹ́wòn nítorí o jẹ̀bi èsùn íwá ájẹbánu àti íwá ìbàjẹ́.

translation.en: Roberts flatly refused to say about when he believes life begins, an important question when considering the ethics of abortion, saying that it would be unethical to comment on the specifics of likely cases.
translation.yo: Roberts kọ jalẹ lati sọ nipa akoko ti o gbagbọ ẹmi bẹrẹ si ni bẹ, ibeere ti o tobi nigba ti eniyan ba n wo ilana oyun sisẹ,wipe yo jẹ eyi ti ko ba ilana iṣe mu lati sọrọ nipa awọn oriṣiriṣi iṣẹlẹ.

translation.en: He did, however, reiterate his earlier statement that Roe v. Wade was the "settled law of the land", emphasizing the importance of consistent Supreme Court rulings.
translation.yo: O se atenumo oro re akoso wipe Roe v. Wade ni “ofin ilu ti o fidi mule”, ti o n se ise pataki si se deede pelu idajo ile ejo giga.

translation.en: He also confirmed that he believed in the implied right to privacy which the Roe decision depended upon.
translation.yo: Ó tún fi yé ni pé òun gbàgbọ́ ninú ẹ̀tọ́ láti dáwà, èyí tí ìgbésẹ̀ Roe dálór.

translation.en: Maroochydore had finished on top of the ladder, six points clear of Noosa in second.
translation.yo: Maroochydore ti parí lórí òkè téńté àkàsọ̀, àmì ayò mẹ́fà ni ó fi la Noosa tí o wà ni ipò kejì.

translation.en: The two sides would meet in the major semi final where Noosa ran out winners by 11 points.
translation.yo: Àwọn igun méjèèjì ni yíó pàdé níkẹyìn àsekágbá ní ibi tí Noosa ti jáwé olúborí pẹ̀lú àmì mọ́kànlá.

translation.en: Maroochydore then defeated Caboolture in the Preliminary Final.
translation.yo: Ìlú Maroochydore sẹ́gun ìlú Caboolture nínú ìkópa kòmẹsẹ̀óyọ tó gbẹ̀yìn.

translation.en: Hesperonychus elizabethae is a species of the family Dromaeosauridae and is a cousin of Velociraptor .
translation.yo: Hesperonychus elizabethae je eya ebi Dromaeosauridae o si je omo egbon tabi aburo Velociraptor.

translation.en: This fully feathered, warm blooded bird of prey was believed to have walked upright on two legs with claws like the Velociraptor.
translation.yo: Won gbagbo pe eye apaje yi to ni iye nigbogbo ara to si je alara gbigbona, ma n ri lori ese mejeje pelu eekana bii ti Felosirapito.

translation.en: Its second claw was larger, giving rise to the name Hesperonychus which means "western claw."
translation.yo: Èékánná rẹ̀ kan gùn ju ìkejì lọ, òhun ni ó fa orúkọ rẹ̀ Hesperonychus tí ó tún túmọ̀ sí “éèkánná ìlà oòrùn.”

translation.en: In addition to the crushing ice, extreme weather conditions have been hampering rescue efforts.
translation.yo: Ní àfiikún yínyìn tó fọ́,̣ pẹ̀lú ojú Ọjọ́ tí ò rọgbọ ní ó dínà aájò ìdóòlà.

translation.en: Pittman suggested that conditions wouldn't improve until sometime next week.
translation.yo: Pittman dámọ̀ràn àtúnse ò ní wáyé bí kò di ọ̀sẹ̀ tó ń bọ̀.

translation.en: The amount and thickness of the pack ice, according to Pittman, is the worst it has been for sealers in the past 15 years.
translation.yo: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí nkan tí Pitmani wí, oye àti kí yìnyìn na ṣe ki sí ló burú jù fún àwọn sílasì ní ọdún 15 tókọjá.

translation.en: News spread in the Red Lake community today as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held that another student was arrested in connection with the school shootings of March 21.
translation.yo: Ìròyìn tàn ká ní agbègbè Red Lake lónìí pé bí ìsìnkú Jeff Weise àti àwọn mẹta nínú mẹsan tó farakásá wáyé wípé ọwọ́ tẹ akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ míràn ní ìbáṣepọ̀ pẹ̀lú ìbọn yínyìn ní ilé ìwé ti ọjọ̀ kankọkànlélógún Oṣù Kẹta.

translation.en: Authorities said little officially beyond confirming today's arrest.
translation.yo: Àwọn aláṣẹ sọ díẹ́ níorí iṣẹ́ tí wọ́n sì jẹ́rìsí mímú tí wọ́n mú wọn.

translation.en: However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, 16-year old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain.
translation.yo: Àmọ́sá, èèyàn kan tó mọ̀ nípa ìwaàdí sọ fún iléeṣẹ́ Minneapolis Star-Tribune wípé Louis Jourdain tó jẹ́ ọmọọdún mẹ́rìndínlógún alága ẹ̀yà Red Lake, Floyd Jourdain ni.

translation.en: It is not known at this time what charges will be laid or what led authorities to the boy but juvenile proceedings have begun in federal court.
translation.yo: A kò mọ̀ ní àkókò yí àwọn àyípadà tí wọ́n ma ṣe àti nkan tó jẹ́kí wọ́n rí ọmọ okùnrin náà gbámú, ṣùgbọ́n ètò ilé ẹjọ́ fún ọ̀dọ́ ti bẹ̀rẹ̀.

translation.en: Lodin also said officials decided to cancel the runoff in order to save Afghans the expense and security risk of another election.
translation.yo: Lodin tún sọ pẹ àwọn òsisẹ́ pinu láti fagilé àtúndì ìbò láti le yọ àwọn ará Afghanistan lọ́wọ́ ìnáwó àti ewu ààbò tó lè jẹyọ nípasè ètò ìdìbò mìíràn.

translation.en: Diplomats said that they had found enough ambiguity in the Afghan constitution to determine the runoff as unnecessary.
translation.yo: Àwọn aṣojú orílẹ̀ èdè sọ pé wọ́n ti ṣí ọkàn wọn sílẹ̀ fún òfin Ilẹ̀ Afghan láti lè pinu runoff bí èyí tí kò pọ́ndandan.

translation.en: This contradicts earlier reports, which said that cancelling the runoff would have been against the constitution.
translation.yo: Èyí tako àbọ̀ àkọ́kọ́, tí ó sọ pé gbigbégilé àfikun ìbò ìba má ba ìlànà òfin lọ.

translation.en: The aircraft had been headed to Irkutsk and was being operated by interior troops.
translation.yo: Ọkọ̀ òfuruufún náà ti darí si Irkutsk pèlú àwọn ikọ ọmọ ogun abélé ni ìsàkósa re.

translation.en: An inquiry was established to investigate.
translation.yo: A dá ìwádi lẹ̀ lati ṣe ìwád.

translation.en: The Il-76 has been a major component of both the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970s, and had already seen a serious accident in Russia last month.
translation.yo: Il-76 ṣe pàtàkì púpọ̀ sí ikọ̀ ológun Russia àti Soviet láti 1970, bẹ́ẹ̀ náà sì ni ó ti rí ìjàǹbá ní Russia ní oṣù tó kọjá.

translation.en: On October 7 an engine separated on takeoff, without injuries. Russia briefly grounded Il-76s after that accident.
translation.yo: Ní ọjọ́ keje osù kẹwàá, ẹ̀rọ ya ibi ìgbéra sọ́tọ, lálàì farapa. ilẹ̀ Russia bẹ̀rẹ̀ ní II-76s ní kéte tí ìjàm̀bá sẹlẹ̀.

translation.en: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
translation.yo: Ẹgbẹ̀rin máìlì ọ̀nà ilé epo Trans-Alaska ni ó di títì pa, látàrí ẹgbẹgbẹ̀rún àgbá epo rọ̀bì to jò dànaù ni gúsù Fairbanks, ni Alaska.

translation.en: A power failure following a routine fire-command system test caused relief valves to open and crude oil overflowed near the Fort Greely pump station 9.
translation.yo: Ìkùnà iná lẹ́yìn àdánwò dédé lóri ètò àṣẹ-iná, ṣokùnfa kí ihò ìrọ̀rùn ṣí sílẹ̀ epo rọ̀bí sì jò sẹ́gbẹ́ ìdí epo Forti Grili 9.

translation.en: The valves opening allowed a pressure release for the system and oil flowed on a pad to a tank that can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons).
translation.yo: Ṣíṣí ìdè ná sílẹ̀ jẹ́ kí ;ó ní ìtúsílẹ̀ fún ẹ̀rọ àti ìṣàn epo sí táǹkì 'tó lè di àgbá epo 55,000 mú (2.3 million gallons.

translation.en: As of Wednesday afternoon, the tank vents were still leaking probably from thermal expansion inside the tank.
translation.yo: Ní ọ̀sán ọjọ́rú, táǹkì náà jò bóyá nítorí thermal expansion nínu táǹkì.

translation.en: Another secondary containment area below the tanks capable of holding 104,500 barrels was not yet filled to capacity.
translation.yo: ipele keji aye ikeru si miran ti o ni anfani lati gba 104,500 bareli ko i ti kun de enu.

translation.en: The comments, live on television, were the first time that senior Iranian sources have admitted that the sanctions are having any effect.
translation.yo: Ọ̀rọ̀ ọ̀hún lórí ètò amóhùnmáwòrán, ni ìgbà àkọ́kọ́ tí abẹnugan àgbà ilẹ̀ Iran kan gbà pé ìbáwí tí wọn fi léde ní ip.

translation.en: They include financial restrictions and a ban by the European Union on the export of crude oil, from which the Iranian economy receives 80% of its foreign income.
translation.yo: Wọn ti se àgbékalẹ̀ òfin fi de ìwọ̀n owó bẹ́ẹ̀ àjọ ìsọ̀kan ilẹ̀ yúròpù sì ti gbegi lé títa epo rọ̀bì sí ìta, ní èyí tí ètò ọrọ̀ ajé àwọn ara Iran fi ń gbà ìdá ọgọ́rin nínú owó̀ ilẹ̀ òkèrè wọn tó ń wọlé.

translation.en: In its most recent monthly report, OPEC said exports of crude had fallen to their lowest level for two decades at 2.8 million barrels per day.
translation.yo: Nínú àkọọ́lẹ̀ olóosòṣù rẹ tó jáde gbèyìǹ, OPEC ní ìkó epo jáde ti já wálẹ̀ fún bí i dẹ́kéèdèméjì bíi mílíọ̀nù mẹ́jì ó lé ẹgbẹ̀rin ẹgbẹ̀rún àgbá lóòjọ́.

translation.en: The country's supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, has described the dependency on oil as "a trap" dating from before Iran's Islamic revolution in 1979 and from which the country should free itself.
translation.yo: Alakoso ilu Ayatola Ali Kamneyi ti fi ifojule epo robi we “idẹkun” to bẹrẹ ki rogbodiyan musulumi ti Irani bẹrẹ ni 1979 ati ti o jẹ nkan ti o yẹ ki ilu gba ara rẹ la lọwọ e.

translation.en: When the capsule gets to Earth and enters the atmosphere, at about 5am (eastern time), it is expected to put on quite a light show for folks in Northern California, Oregon, Nevada, and Utah.
translation.yo: Bí kápísù bá dé inú ayé tí ó wọ inú afẹ́fẹ́, àti ní ǹkan bi í aago márùn ún òwúrọ̀ (àkókò ìlà òrùn) èyí ni wọ́n ń retí wípé yíó sàfihàn eré ráńpẹ́ fáwọn èèyàn tó wà ní àríwá California, Oregon, Nevada, àti Utah.

translation.en: The capsule will look much like a shooting star going across the sky.
translation.yo: Kapsuli naa a jo bii irawo to n fo koja ofurufu.

translation.en: The capsule will be traveling at about 12.8 km or 8 miles per second, fast enough to go from San Francisco to Los Angeles in one minute.
translation.yo: Kápísù náà yíò rìn bí i kìlómítà méjìlá ó lé mẹ́jọ tàbí máàlì mẹ́jọ láàrin ìṣẹ́jú kan, ó yára tó láti lọ sí San Francisco títí lọ Los Angeles láàrin ìṣẹ́jú kan.

translation.en: Stardust will set a new all-time record for being the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, breaking the previous record set in May of 1969 during the return of the Apollo X command module.
translation.yo: Stardust yíò gbé àkọsílẹ̀ tí ó ga jùlọ kalẹ̀ pẹ̀lú bí ó se ba àkọ́sílẹ̀ ti oṣù karùn ún ọdún 1969 jẹ́ ní àkókò ìpadàbọ̀ Apollo X.

translation.en: “It will move over the west coast of northern California and will light the sky from California through central Oregon and on through Nevada and Idaho and into Utah,” Tom Duxbury, Stardust's project manager said.
translation.yo: “O ma si lo sori apa iwo orun Kalifonia Ariwa o de ma tan ina si oku orun lati Kalifonia tit de aarin Orgoni lo si Nefada ati Idaho sinu Uta,” Tom Duxbury, oludari ise ErupeIrawo wi.

translation.en: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate accord isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed nation not to ratify the agreement.
translation.yo: Ìpinnú ọ̀gbẹ́ni Rudd láti buwọ́lú ojú ọjọ́ Kyoto yọ orílẹ̀ èdè Amẹríka sílẹ̀, tí yóò sì wá di orílẹ́ èdè kan ṣoṣo ní àgbáyé tí ó dàgbà tí kò sì wá́ àtúnṣe sí àjùmọ̀gbà.

translation.en: Australia's former conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy with its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries like India and China were not bound by emissions targets.
translation.yo: Ìjọba tí ó nííse pẹ̀lú ìsẹ̀dálẹ̀ ti ilẹ̀ Australia kọ̀ láti fi àṣẹ si Kyoto, sọ pé yíò se àkóbá fún ọrọ̀ ajé pẹ̀lú bí ó se kó gbogbo ara lé kíkó èédú lọ sókè òkun, nígbàtí orílẹ̀èdè bí i India àti China kò se ní ohunkóhun tó de àfojúsùn àgbéjáde èéfín wọn.

translation.en: It is the biggest acquisition in eBay's history.
translation.yo: Ohun lo je oja to tobi ti won ru=ita ni itan gbogbo eBay.

translation.en: The company hopes to diversify its profit sources and gain popularity in areas where Skype holds a strong position, such as China, Eastern Europe, and Brazil.
translation.yo: Iléeṣẹ́ nírètí àti wá ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ ọ̀nà tí èrè yóó fi má a wọlé tí wọ́ yóó sì fi di ìlú mọ̀ọ́ká láwọn agbègbè tí ìtàkùn Skype ti gbalẹ̀, bí i China, apá ìlà oòrùn Europu àti Brazil.

translation.en: Scientists have suspected Enceladus as geologically active and a possible source of Saturn's icy E ring.
translation.yo: Àwọn onímọ̀ sáyẹnsì ti funra sí́ Enceladus gẹ́gẹ́ bí iṣẹ́ rẹ̀, o ṣe e ṣe kí o jẹ orísun fuhn Saturn's icy E ring.

translation.en: Enceladus is the most reflective object in the solar system, reflecting about 90 percent of the sunlight that hits it.
translation.yo: Enceladus ni ó ṣe pàtàkì jùlọ nínú ètò solar, ó ń ṣe àfihàn ohun tí ó tayọ ìdá àádọ́rin nínú ìtàsán oòrun tí ó bà á.

translation.en: The game publisher Konami stated today in a Japanese newspaper that they will not be releasing the game Six Days in Fallujah.
translation.yo: Olùgbéjáde géèmù Konami sọọ́ di mímọ̀ lónìí nínú ìwé ìròyìn ilẹ̀ Japan wípé àwọn kò ní se àgbéjáde géèmù Six Days ní Fallujah.

translation.en: The game is based on the Second Battle of Fallujah, a vicious battle between American and Iraqi forces.
translation.yo: Eré náà dá lórí ìjà Fallujah ìkejì, ìjà kíkan láàrín àwọn ọmọ ogun Amerika àti Iraaki.

translation.en: The ACMA also found that despite the video being streamed on the Internet, Big Brother had not breached online content censorship laws as the media had not been stored on Big Brother's website.
translation.yo: ACMA tun wariri pe biotilejepe won fi fidio naa han lori intaneeti, Egbon Okunrin o tii lodi si awon ofin ipalenumo ero ori intaneeti tori won o ti da midia naa pada si ori saiti Egbon Okunrin.

translation.en: The Broadcasting Services Act provides for the regulation of Internet content, however to be considered Internet content, it must physically reside on a server.
translation.yo: Òfin Ile Iṣẹ́ Gbohun Gbohun pèsè fún ìwọ̀nsí èròjà ayélujára, o gbúdọ̀ wá nínú sáfà kató lè pèé ní èròjà ayélujára.

translation.en: The United States embassy located in Nairobi, Kenya has issued a warning that "extremists from Somalia" are planning to launch suicide bomb attacks in Kenya and Ethiopia.
translation.yo: Ile ise ijoba apapo ti orile ede Amerika ti o wa ni Nairobi, Kenya ti fi ikede lede pe awon “ajagun esin lati Somalia” n gbimopo lati ju ado oloro ni Kenya ati Ethiopia.

translation.en: The U.S. says it has received information from an undisclosed source that specifically mentions the use of suicide bombers to will blow up "prominent landmarks" in Ethiopia and Kenya.
translation.yo: Ilẹ̀ America sọ ọ́ di mímọ̀ pé àwọn gba ìròyìn látọ̀dọ̀ ẹnùkan tó farasin pé wọ́n yío lo àwọn ẹṣin ò kọ kú láti ju àdó abúgbàmù asekúpani sáwọn ibùdó gbòógì ní Ethiopia àti Kenya.

translation.en: Long before The Daily Show and The Colbert Report, Heck and Johnson envisioned a publication that would parody the news—and news reporting—when they were students at UW in 1988.
translation.yo: Sááju Ètò Ojoojúmọ́ àtì Àbábọ̀ Colbert, Heck àti Johnson ti ma ń wòye àgbéjáde tí yíó fara jọ ìròyìn—àti ìjábọ̀ ìròyìn—nígbàtí wọ́n jẹ́ akẹ́ẹ̀kọ́ ní UW ní 1988.

translation.en: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
translation.yo: Láti ìgbà tí wọ́n dáa sílẹ̀ Alubosa ti di ìròyìn ẹlẹ́fẹ́ tó dáju, pẹ̀lú ìtẹ̀jáde, saiti to fa ojú alejò 5,000,000 ọ̀tọ̀tọ̀ ní Owara, ipolowo tara eni, ilé iṢẹ́ ìròyìn tò ṢiṢe fún wákàtí 24, Podkasti, àti ìwé ìmọ̀ ayé - Atlasi ti a Ṣẹ̀ tún gbéjáde tí apé ni “Aye wa tí ò ní Làakáyè”.

translation.en: Al Gore and General Tommy Franks casually rattle off their favorite headlines (Gore's was when The Onion reported he and Tipper were having the best sex of their lives after his 2000 Electoral College defeat).
translation.yo: Al Gore áti ọ̀gágun Tommy Franks láìfọtápè ka àwọn àkọlẹ́ ti´ oníkàlùkùn fẹ́ràn (Ti Gore jé ìgbà tí Onion sọ ìròyìn wípẹ́ òhun áti Tipper n ní ìbálòpọ̀ tó dàra jùlo ní ayé wọn lẹ́yìn ìjákulẹ̀ nínú ìdìbò fún ààrẹ áti igbá kẹji ti 2000).

translation.en: Many of their writers have gone on to wield great influence on Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert's news parody shows.
translation.yo: Púpọ̀ nínú àwọn oǹkọ̀wé wọn ti lọ ní ipa lórí ìròyìn ìfiniṣẹ̀fẹ̀ Jon Stewart àti Stephen Colbert.

translation.en: The artistic event is also part of a campaign by the Bucharest City Hall that seeks to relaunch the image of the Romanian capital as a creative and colourful metropolis.
translation.yo: Ise oluya naa papo mo idije Hoolu Ilu Bukaresti ti o fe tun irisi ilu agbara Roomu naa se gege bii ilu nla ti o ni awo pupo ti o la.

translation.en: The city will be the first in southeastern Europe to host CowParade, the world's largest public art event, between June and August this year.
translation.yo: Ìlú náà jẹ àkọ́kọ́ irú rẹ ní gúúsu ìlà-òrùn Yúróòpù làti gbàlẹjò CowParade, ìsẹ̀lè àwòrán ìtagbangba tó tóbi jù làgbàyà, lààrin Osù Kẹfà sí ìkẹjọ odùn yí.

translation.en: Today's announcement also extended the government's commitment made in March of this year to fund extra carriages.
translation.yo: Ikede oni na sí ileri ijoba lati fowo sí eru gbigbe sii ti wọ́́n se ní Èbìbí.

translation.en: An additional 300 brings the total to 1,300 carriages to be acquired to relieve overcrowding.
translation.yo: Tí a ba fi ọ̀ọ́dúnrún ún kún un, gbogbo ọkọ̀ náà ma dí ẹ̀ẹ́dẹ́gbèje tí a níláti gbà kí èrò má pọ̀jù sójú kan jù.

translation.en: Christopher Garcia, a spokesperson of the Los Angeles Police Department, said the suspected male offender is being investigated for trespassing rather than vandalism.
translation.yo: Christopher Garcia, agbẹnusọ fún ẹ̀ka ọlọ́pa Los Angeles, sọ pé wọ́n ti gba ìwádìí lẹnu eni tí wọ́n fura sí ọkùnrin náà fún kíkọjá ayè rẹ́.

translation.en: The sign was not physically damaged; the modification was done using black tarpaulins decorated with signs of peace and heart to alter the "O" to read lowercase "e".
translation.yo: Gbogbo ami naa ko ni oje bibaje, won se atunde pelu ora dud pelu ami alaafia ati ife lati se atunse si “O” ki o le dabi “e”.

translation.en: Red tide is caused by a higher than normal concentration of Karenia brevis, a naturally-occurring single-celled marine organism.
translation.yo: Àìsàn Red tide ma ń wáyé bí̀ Karenia brevis bá wọ́pọ̀ ju bí ó se yẹ lọ, ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ àdéyébá tí wọ́n pè ní kòkòrò inú omi.

translation.en: Natural factors can intersect to produce ideal conditions, allowing this algae to increase in number dramatically.
translation.yo: Àwọn ohun àdáyébá lè kórajọ láti pèsè ààyè tó dára, èyí tí yíó fún àwọn ewé yìí láàyè àti pọ̀ níye dáradára.

translation.en: The algae produces a neurotoxin that can disable nerves in both humans and fish.
translation.yo: Àwọn ewé ń pèsè oró tó lè sèpalára sọ́fun àwọn èèyàn àti ẹja.

translation.en: Fish often die because of the high concentrations of the toxin in the waters.
translation.yo: Eja maa n saba ku nitori awon oro to ropo ninu omi.

translation.en: Humans can be affected by breathing affected water taken into the air by wind and waves.
translation.yo: Àwọn omi tí kò dára tí atẹ́gùn àti ìjì ti gbé lọ sínu afẹ́fẹ́ lè ṣe ìpalára fénìyàn tí ó bá fà á símú.

translation.en: At its peak, Tropical Cyclone Gonu, named for a bag of palm leaves in the language of the Maldives, reached sustained winds of 240 kilometers an hour (149 miles per hour) .
translation.yo: Lókè tẹ́ntẹ́n,Tropical Cyclone Gonu, ti sọ lórúkọ fún àpò ẹwẹ́ igi ọ̀pẹ ni èdè Maldives, dẹ gẹ̀rẹ́gẹ̀rẹ́ ìjì fún ogójìlénígba ìbùsọ̀ ní wákàtí kan (òkàndínládọ́ta ìbùsọ̀ ni wákàtí kan).

translation.en: By early today, winds were around 83 km/h, and it was expect to keep weakening.
translation.yo: Ní bí i ìdájí òní àfẹ́fẹ́ fẹ́ tó bí kìlómítà mẹ́tàlélọ́gọ́rin láàrin wákàtí, a dẹ̀ retí pé agbára ẹ̀ á ma kéré sí.

translation.en: On Wednesday, the United States' National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns regarding COVID-19.
translation.yo: Ní ọjọ́ Ọjọ́rú, Ẹgbẹ́ United States' National Basketball Association (NBA) fi ìdádúró sí sáà gbígbá bọ́ọ̀lù àfọwọ́gbá wọn látàrí ààrùn kògbóògun COVID-19.

translation.en: The NBA's decision followed a Utah Jazz player testing positive for the COVID-19 virus.
translation.yo: Ìpinu NBA wáyé lẹ́yìn tí olórin Jaasi láti Utah ní kofidi 19.

translation.en: "Based on this fossil, that means the split is much earlier than has been anticipated by the molecular evidence.
translation.yo: “Tí a bá fi sí ìdá fossil yìí, ìyẹ́n túnmọ̀ sí wípé lílà tí ó là ti pẹ́ díẹ̀ jú bí a ti lérò látàrí èrí tí molecule fún wa.

translation.en: That means everything has to be put back," said researcher at the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study, Berhane Asfaw.
translation.yo: Ó túmọ̀sí wípé ohun gbogbo ní láti padàbọ̀ sípò “olùsàyẹ̀wò ní iléeṣẹ́ Rift Valle nilẹ̀ Ethiopia àti olùkọ̀we ìwáàdí Berhane Asfaw.

translation.en: Until now, AOL has been able to move and develop the IM market at its own pace, due to its widespread use within the United States.
translation.yo: Títí di ìsín AOL tilè mú ìdàgbàsókè àti ìtẹ̀síwájú ọjà IM wáyé ní iwọnsí tiẹ̀, ní torípé ilò rẹ̀ kári gbogbo Ìlú Amerika.

translation.en: With this arrangement in place, this freedom might end.
translation.yo: Pẹ̀lú títò yìí, ìgbàláyè yìí lé dópin.

translation.en: The number of users of the Yahoo! and Microsoft services combined will rival the number of AOL's customers.
translation.yo: Iye àwọn tón lo Yahu! àti iṣẹ́ Mikrosofti ò lè kere jú tí àwọn onibaara AOL lọ.

translation.en: The Northern Rock bank had been nationalised in 2008 following the revelation that the company had received emergency support from the UK Government.
translation.yo: Ilé ìfowópamọ́ Northern Rock ti di ti ará ìlú ní ọdún 2008, lẹ́yìn ìlanilójú pé iléẹṣẹ́ náà ti gba ìrànwọ́ pàjáwìrì láti ọ̀dọ̀ ìjọba ilẹ̀ UK.

translation.en: Northern Rock had required support due to its exposure during the subprime mortgage crisis in 2007.
translation.yo: Northen Rock ti béèrè fún àtìlẹyìn látàrí ohun tó ṣẹlẹ̀ nínú àjálù ẹ̀yáwo aláìleèsanpadà ní ọdún 2007.

translation.en: Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group had a bid for the bank rejected prior to the bank’s nationalisation.
translation.yo: Ẹgbẹ́ Virgin ti Sir Richard Branson ní ìdù fún ǹkan ti ilé ìfowópamọ́ ti kọ̀ sílẹ̀ ṣáájú ìyípòpadà ilé ìfowópamọ́.

translation.en: In 2010, while nationalised, the current high street bank Northern Rock plc was split from the ‘bad bank’, Northern Rock (Asset Management).
translation.yo: Nígbàtí ètò ìsọdi orílẹ̀èdè wáyé lọ́dún 2010, wọ́n pín ilé ìfowópamọ́sí gíga Northern Rock plc kúrò lára ‘báńkì burúkú’ Northern Rock (ìsàkóso ohun ìní).

translation.en: Virgin have only purchased the ‘good bank’ of Northern Rock, not the asset management company.
translation.yo: Wúndíá ti ra “ilé ìfowópamọ́sí” ti Northern Rock, kì í se iléeṣẹ́ tó ń sàkóso ohun ìní.

translation.en: This is believed to be the fifth time in history that people have observed what turned out to be chemically confirmed martian material falling to Earth.
translation.yo: Eyi ni yio je igba karun ninu itan ti awon eniyan ti se akiyesi pe awon oun ti a fi idi re mu le pelu kemica lati je ohun ija n jabo si ori ile aye.

translation.en: Out of the approximately 24,000 known meteorites to have fallen to Earth, only about 34 have been verified to be martian in origin.
translation.yo: Láàrin orísìírìsìí òkúta àti àwọn nǹkan tí ye wọ́n tó ẹgbẹ̀rún mẹ́rìnlélógún tí a mọ̀ tí ó sọ̀kalẹ̀ sílé ayé láti ojú òfúrufú bí i mẹ́rìnlélógún ni a ti fìdí rẹ múlẹ̀ láti jẹ martian..

translation.en: Fifteen of these rocks are attributed to the meteorite shower last July.
translation.yo: Maarundinlogun lára awon òkúta wọ̀nyí ni òjò mitiyo Agëmọ tó kọjá fà.

translation.en: Some of the rocks, which are very rare on Earth, are being sold from US$11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, which is about ten times more than the cost of gold.
translation.yo: Ọ̀pọ̀ àwọn àpáta tó ṣọ̀wọ́n ní ayé ní wọ́n ń tà láàrin ẹgbẹ̀rún mọ́kànlá dọ́là ti lẹ̀ US sí ẹgbẹ̀rún méjìlélógún ó lé ẹ̀ẹ́dẹ́gbẹ̀ta dọ́là fún ounce kan, èyí tí ó dàbí ìlọ́pọ mẹ́wàá jú iye góòlù lọ.

translation.en: Following the race, Keselowski remains the Drivers' Championship leader with 2,250 points.
translation.yo: Lẹ́yìn ere náà Keseloski ṣi wà nípo kíní Ìdíje Awakọ̀ pẹ̀lú pointi 2,250.

translation.en: Seven points behind, Johnson is second with 2,243.
translation.yo: Ojú àmì méje ló fi dín, John gbé ipò kejì pẹ̀lú 2,243.

translation.en: In third, Hamlin is twenty points behind, but five ahead of Bowyer. Kahne and Truex, Jr. are fifth and sixth respectively with 2,220 and 2,207 points.
translation.yo: Ni ipo keta Amlini ni dinku pointi 20, sugbon o saju Boya pelu maarun. Kani ati Truesi, Jr. gba ipo karun ati kefa pelu 2,220 ati 2,207 ni kookan won.

translation.en: Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, and Harvick round out the top-ten positions for the Drivers' Championship with four races remaining in the season.
translation.yo: Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, àti Harvick parí ìdíje olúborí awakọ ní ipò mẹ́wàá àkọ́kọ́̀ níbi eréje se ku mẹ́rin ní sáà .

translation.en: The US Navy also said they were investigating the incident.
translation.yo: Ọmo ogun US tún sọ pé wọ́n ṣe ìwádìí ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ náà.

translation.en: They also said in a statement, "The crew is currently working to determine the best method of safely extracting the ship".
translation.yo: Won tubo foro le pe, “Awon to alaakoso oko oju omi ti n sa agbara won lati mo ona to dara ju lati yo oko naa laisi ifarapa.

translation.en: An Avenger class mine countermeasures ship, the ship was on its way to Puerto Princesa in Palawan.
translation.yo: Maini oniwonn Afenja ma n takoiwon oko oju omi, oko naa wa loju ona to n lo si Puweto Princesa ni Palawaani.

translation.en: It is assigned to the U.S. Navy’s Seventh Fleet and based in Sasebo, Nagasaki in Japan.
translation.yo: A fún Ẹgbẹ́ Keje àwọn Sójà Ojú Omi Amerika tó wà ní Sasebo Nagasaki, Jépaani.

translation.en: The Mumbai attackers arrived via boat on Novemeber 26, 2008, bringing with them grenades, automatic weapons and hit multiple targets including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal Hotel.
translation.yo: Àwọn tó gbéjà wọ Mumbai dé pẹ̀lú ọkọ̀ ojú omi ní ọja kẹrìndínlọ́gbọ̀n oṣù kọkànlá ọdún, 2008, wọ́n mú àwọn ohun ijà, àwọn ìbọn tó lè yìn fún ra rẹ̀ tó sì ma ba ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ ibi,pẹ̀lú ibi tí èrò pọ̀ sí ibi ọkọ̀ rẹluwéy Chhatrapati Shivaji àti gbajúgbajà ilé ìtura Taj Mahal.

translation.en: David Headley's scouting and information gathering had helped to enable the operation by the 10 gunmen from the Pakistani militant group Laskhar-e-Taiba.
translation.yo: Ìfimúnlẹ̀ àti ìwadìí David Headley ti se ìrànlọ́wọ́ fún isẹ́ àkànṣe láti ọwọ́ àwọn ikọ̀ agbẹ́bọn mẹwa láti ẹgbẹ́ agbẹ́sùmònmí Pakistani Laskhar-e-Taiba.

translation.en: The attack put a huge strain on relations between India and Pakistan.
translation.yo: Ijakadi naa fa idinwo si ibasepo aarin India ati Pakistan.

translation.en: Accompanied by those officials, he assured Texas citizens that steps were being taken to protect the public's safety.
translation.yo: Pelu awon osise naa, o da awon olugbe Tegsasi loju pe won ti n gbe awon igbese lati daabo bo ailewu awujo eda.

translation.en: Perry specifically said, "There are few places in the world better equipped to meet the challenge that is posed in this case."
translation.yo: Perry dìídì sọ wípé, “àwọn ibi díẹ̀ ló wà ni ayé tí ó ni ohun tí wọn nílò láti kọjú ìṣòro ọ̀rọ̀ yì.”

translation.en: The governor also stated, "Today, we learned that some school aged children have been identified as having had contact with the patient."
translation.yo: Gómìnà náà tún sọpé, Lónìí, a gbọ́ pé a ti rí àwọn ọmọ ilé ìwé tó ti farakan aláìsàn náà.”

translation.en: He went on to say, "This case is serious. Rest assured that our system is working as well as it should."
translation.yo: Ó tún tẹ̀síwájú sọ wípé “ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ yìí lágbára. Fọkànbalẹ̀ wípé ètò wa ti ń síṣẹ́ bí ó se y.”

translation.en: If confirmed, the find completes Allen's eight-year search for the Musashi.
translation.yo: Tó bá jẹ àrídájú, dídi rírí Musassh fi òpin sí wíwá Allen fún ọdún mẹ́jọ .

translation.en: Following seabed mapping the wreck was found using an ROV.
translation.yo: Látàrí Àwòrán abẹ́ òkun, wọn ṣe àwárí ìjànbá náà nípa lílo ROV.

translation.en: One of the world's richest people, Allen has reportedly invested much of his wealth in marine exploration and began his quest to find the Musashi out of a lifelong interest in the war.
translation.yo: Ikan ninu awon eyan to lowo ju laye, won ni Aleni ti fi pupo ninu owo e sinu iwariri omi, iwaadi re lati ri Musasi waye nitorip o ti nifesi ogin naa lati ojo pipe.

translation.en: She gained critical acclaim during her time in Atlanta and was recognized for innovative urban education.
translation.yo: Nígbàtí o lò ní Atlanta ó rí ìyìn àwọn ìdánilójú pàtàkì gbà wọ́n dẹ̀ daamo fún iṣé àtinúdá to ṣe fún ìwé kíkọ́ ti ìlú.

translation.en: In 2009 she was awarded the title of National Superintendent of the Year.
translation.yo: Ní ọdún 2009 wọ́n fún ní oyè Alábójútó àgbà Orílẹ̀ èdè ti Ọdún.

translation.en: At the time of the award, Atlanta schools had seen a large improvement on test scores.
translation.yo: Ní àsìkò àmì ẹ̀yẹ̀ náà, ilé-ẹkọ́ Atlanta ti rí ìlọsíwájú lórí èsì ìdánwò.

translation.en: Shortly after, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report showing problems with test results.
translation.yo: Leyin igba die, iwe iroyin to je ti ofin ti Atlanta gbe iroyinto safihan isoro pelu esi abajade.

translation.en: The report showed test scores had increased implausibly fast, and alleged the school internally detected problems but didn't act on the findings.
translation.yo: Ìjábọ̀ ṣàfihàn èsì ìdánwó pé ó ti tètè lọ sókè, ò sí jẹ́ kí ilé ìwé náà kófìrí àwọn ìṣòro abẹ́lé ṣùgbọ́n wọn kò ṣiṣk lórí ìwádìí wọn.

translation.en: Evidence thereafter indicated test papers were tampered with Hall, along with 34 other education officials, was indicted in 2013.
translation.yo: Ẹ̀rí fi hàn wípé wọn ti fi ọwọ́ kan àwọn bébà àyẹ̀wò àti Gbọǹgàn pẹ̀lú àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ ètò ẹ̀kọ́ mẹ́rìnlelọ́gbọ̀n ní ọdún 201.

translation.en: The Irish government is stressing the urgency of parliamentary legislation to rectify the situation.
translation.yo: Ìjọba Irish n tenumó ìsẹpàtàkì ìsòfin láti ilé ìgbìmò asòfin láti sẹ àtúnsẹ ìsèlè náà.

translation.en: "It is now important from both a public health and criminal justice perspective that the legislation be enacted as soon as possible", said a government spokesperson.
translation.yo: “Ó ti wá pọn dandan látinú ìwòye àwọn elétò ìlera àwùjọ àti adájọ́ ọ̀ràn dídá pé kí wọ́n buwọ́lu òfin ní kánmọ́ kánmọ́ ”gẹ́gẹ́ bí alukoro ìjọba ti wí.

translation.en: The Health Minister expressed concern both for the welfare of individuals taking advantage of the temporary legality of the substances involved, and for drug-related convictions handed down since the now-unconstitutional changes came into effect.
translation.yo: Minista Ilera so pe o kaanu fun oro itoju awon to n lo anfani pe won ti fowo si ilo awon ogun naa fun igba die, ati fun awon ti won ran si ewon nitori ogun, ti won gbe wa lati igba ti awon ayipada to ti wa lodi si konstitution, ti waye.

translation.en: Jarque was practicing during pre-season training at Coverciano in Italy earlier in the day. He was staying in the team hotel ahead of a match planned for Sunday against Bolonia.
translation.yo: Jarque ń gbárádì lákòókò Coverciano ní Italy ní ásíkó ìmúrasílè fún ìdíje ní kùtùkùtù òwúrọ. O ń gbé ni´ ilé ìtura sáájú ìdíje tí a sètò fún ọjọ́ aìkú tako Boloni.

translation.en: He was staying in the team hotel ahead of a match planned for Sunday against Bolonia.
translation.yo: Ó dúró sí ile itura ëgbẹ́ ṣáaju ẹrẹ́ tí wọ́n ti ṣètò fún pẹ̀lú Bosnia lọ́jọ́ Ìsinmi.

translation.en: The bus was headed to Six Flags St. Louis in Missouri for the band to play to a sold-out crowd.
translation.yo: Okò akẹ́rò náà darí sí àsíà kẹfà Louis mímó ní Missouri fùn ẹgbẹ́ ẹlẹ́rẹ́ náà láti sẹrẹ̀ fún àwọn ènìyàn tó rà tikeeti tan.

translation.en: At 1:15 a.m. Saturday, according to witnesses, the bus was going through a green light when the car made a turn in front of it.
translation.yo: Ni aago kàn kojá ìséjú márùndínlógún gégé bi ẹlẹri, ọkò akérò náà lọ níbi iná aláwọ ewé, nígbàtí ọkọ̀ ayọ́kélẹ´ náà yíwọ́ níwájú rẹ̀.

translation.en: As of the night of August 9, the eye of Morakot was about seventy kilometres away from the Chinese province of Fujian.
translation.yo: Ní bí alẹ́ ọjọ́ kẹsan oṣù kẹjọ, ojú Morakot kò ju àádọ́rin kìlómítà sí agbegbè Fujian àwọn Chines.

translation.en: The typhoon is estimated to be moving toward China at eleven kph.
translation.yo: A se efufu naa ni ona ti yio fi morile China ni ibuso mokanla laarin wakati kan.

translation.en: Passengers were given water as they waited in 90(F)-degree heat.
translation.yo: Wọ́n fún àwọn èrò ní omi bí wọ́n ṣe dúró nínu orun 90(F).

translation.en: Fire captain Scott Kouns said, "It was a hot day in the Santa Clara with temperatures in the 90s.
translation.yo: Òṣìṣẹ́ panápaná, Scott Kouns sọ pé “ó jẹ́ ọjọ́ tí ó gbóná ni Santa Clara, tí gbígbónà náà sí tó ìwọ̀n àádọ́rùn-ún.

translation.en: Any length of time trapped on a roller coaster would be uncomfortable, to say the least, and it took at least an hour to get the first person off the ride."
translation.yo: Àkókò kí àkókò tí ènìyàn bá fi wà nínú rólá kosìtà má a nìyàn lára ó kéré jù, àti wípé ó ma ń gba èèyàn tó ókéré tán wákàtí kan láti mún ẹni àkọ́kọ́ jáde.

translation.en: Schumacher who retired in 2006 after winning the Formula 1 championship seven times, was due to replace the injured Felipe Massa.
translation.yo: Sumaka ti o gba idasile ise ni 2006 leyin ti o yege fun idije Formula 1 lemeje, lo ye ki o ropo Felipe Masa ti o sise.

translation.en: The Brazilian suffered a serious head injury after a crash during the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.
translation.yo: Ara Brasili naa ṣèṣe gidi gaan lórí lẹ́yìn tó ní ìjàmbá ní Ìdíje Prisi Nla ti Ongari.

translation.en: Massa is due to be out for at least the rest of the 2009 season.
translation.yo: Ó ti yẹ kí Massa jáde fún ókéré tán títí di òpin sáà 2009.

translation.en: Arias tested positive for a mild case of the virus, Presidential Minister Rodrigo Arias said.
translation.yo: Àbájádẹ àyèwò fihàn pé Arias ti kó aàrùn náà ní íwọn bíntín, Òjísé Ààrẹ Rodrigo Arias fi síta.

translation.en: The president's condition is stable, though he will be isolated at home for several days.
translation.yo: Ara ààrẹ̀ ti balẹ̀, lóòótọ́ ó sì má a wà ní ìyaraẹnisọ́tọ̀ nílé fún ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ ọjọ́.

translation.en: "Apart from the fever and a sore throat, I feel well and in good shape to carry out my work by telecommuting.
translation.yo: “Leyin iba ati egbo onafun, araa mi ya lati se gbogbo ise naa lati ilu pelu ero ibanisoro ati ayelujara.

translation.en: I expect to return to all my duties on Monday," Arias said in a statement.
translation.yo: “Mo ní ìrẹ̀tí láti padà sí ibi isẹ́ mi ní Ọjọ́ Ajé,” Arias wi nínú àtẹ̀jádẹ.

translation.en: Felicia, once a Category 4 storm on the Saffir-Simpson Hurricane Scale, weakened to a tropical depression before dissipating Tuesday.
translation.yo: Felisia, to fi ìgbà kan jẹ ìjì to wà lórí Abala 4 ní Ojú Ìwọ̀n Ìjì Nla ti Saffir-Simpson, rẹlẹ̀ sí ìjì nla ti ọ̀nà òòorùn kí o to papà fónká ní Ọjọ́ Ìségun.

translation.en: Its remnants produced showers across most of the islands, though as of yet, no damage or flooding has been reported.
translation.yo: Ìyókù rẹ̀ má dàbí òjò ní island, ṣùgbọ́n kòsí omiyalé tí a ti gbọ́.

translation.en: The precipitation, reaching 6.34 inches at a gauge on Oahu, was described as "beneficial".
translation.yo: Ìwọ́n ojò rírọ̀ náà, tó dé 6.34 ní Oahu, ní wọ́n ṣàpèjúwè gẹ́gẹ́ bí èyí tóní “àǹfàn.”

translation.en: Some of the rainfall was accompanied by thunderstorms and frequent lightning.
translation.yo: Mọ̀nàmọ́ná tí ó ṣe dédé àti àrá ní ó tẹ̀lé díẹ̀ nínu òjò tí ó rọ̀.

translation.en: The Twin Otter had been trying to land at Kokoda yesterday as Airlines PNG Flight CG4684, but had aborted once already.
translation.yo: Ọkọ̀ ojú òfúrufú Twin Otter ti ń gbìyànjú à ti balẹ̀ sí Kokoda ní àná bí i àwọn bàálù PNG CG4684, àmọ́ ó ti sẹ́rí padà lẹ́ẹ̀kan.

translation.en: About ten minutes before it was due to land from its second approach it disapeared.
translation.yo: Bí ìṣẹ́jú mewa kí o tó wàlẹ̀ ò pòorá ní gbà tí o n lọlẹ̀ lẹ́ẹ̀kej.

translation.en: The crash site was located today and is so inaccessable that two policemen were dropped into the jungle in order to hike to the scene and seek survivors.
translation.yo: Won ri ibi tí ìjàmbá ti ṣẹlẹ̀ lóní ò dẹ́ ṣòró láti débẹ̀ torí olopa méjì ní wọ́n fisílẹ̀ sínu igbó láti rìn dé ibẹ̀ láti wá àwọn tí ó yẹ̀ rí.

translation.en: The search had been hampered by the same bad weather that had caused the aborted landing.
translation.yo: Ojú ọjọ tí kò dára tó fa ìbọ́lẹ̀ pàjáwìrì náà lótú dínà ìwárí rẹ̀ náà.

translation.en: According to reports, an apartment on Macbeth Street exploded due to a gas leak.
translation.yo: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí àwọn ìjábọ̀, ilé kan ní òpópónà Macbeth gbiná látàrí gáàsì afẹ́fẹ́ tó jò.

translation.en: An official with the gas company was reporting to the scene after a neighbor called about a gas leak.
translation.yo: Aládarí pẹ̀lú iléeṣẹ́ gáàsì ń jábọ̀ sí ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ lẹ́yìn tí alájọgbé pè nípa gáàsì tó ń jò.

translation.en: When the official arrived, the apartment exploded.
translation.yo: Ní ìgbà tí àwọn aṣojú dé, ilé náà gbaná.

translation.en: No major injuries were reported, but at least five people on scene at the time of the explosion were treated for symptoms of shock.
translation.yo: Kò jábọ̀ ìṣeléṣe púpọ̀, ṣùgbọ́n ó kéré jù àwọn ènìyàn márùn tó wà níbẹ̀ ní àkókò tí gbàmù náà ṣẹlẹ̀ ní wọ́n ṣàyẹ̀wò ìyàlẹ́nu fún.

translation.en: No one was inside the apartment.
translation.yo: Kò sí èyàn kan kan nílé ná.

translation.en: At the time, nearly 100 residents were evacuated from the area.
translation.yo: Nigba naa, bii awon olugbe 100 ni won le kuro ni agbegbe.

translation.en: Both golf and rugby are set to return to the Olympic Games.
translation.yo: Won ti fe da golfi ati rugby pada si Ere Olimpiki.

translation.en: The International Olympic Committee voted to include the sports at its executive board meeting in Berlin today. Rugby, specifically rugby union, and golf were selected over five other sports to be considered to participate in the Olympics.
translation.yo: Àwọn aláṣẹ Ìgbìmọ̀ Olympic làgbáláayé ninú ìpàdé tí o wáyé ni Berlin lónìí dìbò láti ṣe àfikún eré-ìdárayá nínú ìpàdé ìgbìmọ̀ aláṣẹ. Rugby, pàápàá ẹgbẹ́ Rugby àti golf ni wọ́n sàyàn nínú àwọn eré ìdárayá mìíràn bíi márùn ún tí wọ́n gbé kalẹ̀ láti kópa nínú ìdíje Olympics.

translation.en: Squash, karate and roller sports tried to get onto the Olympic program as well as baseball and softball, which were voted out of the Olympic Games in 2005.
translation.yo: Eré́ ìdárayà ẹlẹ́gẹ́dẹ́, jíja ẹ̀sẹ́ àti pẹ̀lú ìpá àti sisare ohun táyà lẹ́sẹ̀ bàtà gbìyànjú láti jẹ́ òkan lára ́àwọǹ ètò Olympicgẹ́gẹ́ bi bọlu àfọwọ́gbá ati onì fùkẹ̀fùkẹ̀,́ àwọǹ èyí tí a yọkúrò nípa ìdìbò kúrò nínú àwọn eré Olympici ní ọdún 200.

translation.en: The vote must still be ratified by the full IOC at it's October meeting in Copenhagen.
translation.yo: Gbogbo ìgbìmọ̀ IOC gbọ́dọ̀ tún buwọ́lu ìbò náà nínú ìpàdé oṣù kẹwàá ní Copenhagen.

translation.en: Not all were supportive of the inclusion of the women’s ranks.
translation.yo: Kìí ṣe gbogbo èyàn ló faramọ́ pé kí wọ́n fi ipò àwọn Obìrin náà síi.

translation.en: 2004 Olympic silver medallist Amir Khan said, "Deep down I think women shouldn’t fight. That’s my opinion."
translation.yo: Eni tó gba silver ní Olympics 2004 Amir Khan sọ pé, “Ní ìsàlẹ̀ ikùn mo rò pé kò yẹ kí àwọn obìnrin ma jà. Àmọ̀ràn mi nìyẹ.”

translation.en: Despite his comments he said he will be supporting the British competitors at the 2012 Olympics being held in London.
translation.yo: Láìfisẹ àwọn ọ̀rọ̀ re o sọ wípé òhun o sàtìlẹyìn fún àwọn òlùdíjẹ Ilẹ Gẹ̀ẹ́sí ní Olimpiki 2012 tí o n lọ lọ́wọ́ ni Londonu.

translation.en: The trial took place at Birmingham Crown Court and concluded on August 3.
translation.yo: Ìgbẹ́jọ́ wáyé ní ilé ẹjọ́ Birmingham Crown ó sì parí ní ọjọ́ kẹta osù kẹjọ.

translation.en: The presenter, who was arrested at the scene, denied the attack and claimed he used the pole to protect himself from bottles being thrown at him by up to thirty people.
translation.yo: Adari eto naa, eniti won gbamu ni ibi isele naa, se lori isele na o si s’alaye wipe oun lo opo naa lati daabo bo ara oun pelu bi awon eniyan ni ogbon se n ju igo mo oun.

translation.en: Blake was also convicted of attempting to pervert the course of justice.
translation.yo: Wọ́n ju Blake sí ẹ̀wọ̀n fún ìgbìyànjú rl láti da òfin rú.

translation.en: The judge told Blake it was "almost inevitable" he was going to be sent to jail.
translation.yo: Adájọ́ náà sọ fún Blake wípé “o dáni lójú gigdigidi” o máà di rírán lọ si éwọ́n.

translation.en: Dark energy is a completely invisible force that is constantly acting upon the universe.
translation.yo: Agbara okunkun je ohun aiiri ti o n sise agbara lori ile aye ni gbogbo igba.

translation.en: Its existence is known only because of its effects on the expansion of the universe.
translation.yo: Wiwa laye re je nkan mimo nitori bi o se fẹ agbaye.

translation.en: Scientists have discovered landforms littered across the moon's surface called lobate scarps that have apparently resulted from the moon's shrinking very slowly.
translation.yo: Àwọn onímò-ìjìnlẹ ti sàwárí àwọn ibi òkè ohun ìpètélè ti o fónká kiri ojú òsùpá ti a n pẹ ni lobate scarps èyí ni àyọrìsí mímú òsùpá súnrakí ní díè díè.

translation.en: These scarps were found all over the moon and appear to be minimally weathered, indicating that the geologic events that created them were fairly recent.
translation.yo: Àwọn ilẹ̀ tó dàgẹ̀ẹ̀rẹ̀ aláfọwọ́dá yìí ló wà káàkiri òsùpa\ ló dà bí ẹni pé afẹ́fẹ́ ti fẹ́ síwọn, se àfihàn pé ìlànà jiọ́lọ́jì tí wọ́n fi se wọ́n kò tí ì pẹ́.

translation.en: This theory contradicts the claim that the moon is completely devoid of geologic activity.
translation.yo: Ìlànà yìí tako ọ̀rọ̀ tó ní òsùpá kò ní ohun kankan se pẹ̀lú iṣẹ ìmọ̀́ ìjìnlẹ̀ ayé.

translation.en: The man allegedly drove a three-wheeled vehicle armed with explosives into a crowd.
translation.yo: Won nipe okunrin naa wa oko elese meta ti o kun fun bombu si inu ero.

translation.en: The man suspected of detonating the bomb was detained, after sustaining injuries from the blast.
translation.yo: Wọ́n ti fi páńpẹ́ òfin gbé ọkùnrin tí wọ́n fura sí pé o ju àdó olóró, lẹ́yìn tí ó ṣèse látàrí ìjàmbá àdó olóró náà.

translation.en: His name is still unknown to authorities, although they do know he is a member of the Uighur ethnic group.
translation.yo: Orúkọ rl kò tí jẹ́ mímọ̀ fún àwọn aláṣẹ, ṣùgbọ́n wọ́n mọ̀ pé ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ ẹ̀yà Uighur.

translation.en: Nadia, born on September 17, 2007, by Cesarean section at a maternity clinic in Aleisk, Russia, weighed in at a massive 17 pounds 1 ounce.
translation.yo: Nadia tí wọ́n bí ní ọjọ́ kẹtàdínlógún oṣù kẹsàn án láti abala iṣẹ́ abẹ nílé ìwòsàn tó wà ní Aleisk, Russia lówọn tó pọ́ùn mẹ́tàdínlógún ní áùnsì kan.

translation.en: "We were all simply in shock," the mother stated.
translation.yo: “Gbogbo wa ló yà lẹ́nu,” lohun tí ìyá sọ.

translation.en: When asked what the father said, she answered "He couldn't say a thing - he just stood there blinking."
translation.yo: Nígbàtí wọ́n bií ní nkan tí bàbá náà wí óní “kò kè sọ nkankan - ó kàn dúró o n ṣẹ́jú.

translation.en: "It's going to behave like water. It's transparent just the way water is.
translation.yo: “O ma se bii ti omi. A ma tinirunwa bi omi se je.

translation.en: So if you were standing by the shoreline, you would be able to see down to whatever pebbles or gunk that was on the bottom.
translation.yo: Nítorínà bí o bá dúró lẹ́bàá òkun, wà á lè rí ìsàlẹ̀ rí òkúta tàbí ìdọ̀tí tó wà nísàlẹ̀.

translation.en: As far as we know, there is only one planetary body that displays more dynamism than Titan, and its name is Earth," added Stofan.
translation.yo: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí a ṣe mọ̀,ara kan ló wà tó ṣàfihàn orísiríṣi ọ̀nà ju Titan lọ, orúkọ rẹ̀ sì ni Ilé ayé, “Stofan la sọ bẹ́ẹ̀.

translation.en: The issue started on January 1st when dozens of local residents started complaining to the Obanazawa Post Office that they hadn't received their traditional and regular New Year cards.
translation.yo: Oro naa bere ni Sere 1st nigbati opolopo awon ara agbegbe bere sini kun nipa Ile Ise Ifiranse Obanasawa, pe won o tii ri kaadi Odun Titun, ti alasade ati ti deede, gba.

translation.en: Yesterday, the post office released their apology to citizens and the media after discovering that the boy had hidden more than 600 postal documents, including 429 New Year postcards, which weren't delivered to their intended recipients.
translation.yo: Ní àná ilé-iṣẹ́ ìfìwéránṣẹ́ sàgbéjáde ẹ̀bẹ̀ wọn sí àwọn ará ìlú àti àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ ìròyìn lẹ́yin tí wọ́n sàwárí wípé ọmọkùnrin náà ti fi ìwé tíwọ́nfiránṣẹ́ tó lé ní ẹgbẹ̀ta pamọ́́ nínú èyí tí ìránṣẹ́ ìkínni ọdún tó tó okòólénirinwó ó lé mẹ́sàn án tí wọ́n kò fi ránṣẹ́ sáwọn tó yẹ ló gbàá.

translation.en: The unmanned lunar orbiter Chandrayaan-1 ejected its Moon Impact Probe (MIP), which hurtled across the surface of the Moon at 1.5 kilometres per second (3000 miles per hour), and successfully crash landed near the Moon's south pole.
translation.yo: Ọkọ̀ aládásiṣẹ́ afara jọ òṣùpá ojú òfúrufú Chandrayaan-1 ti yọ irinṣẹ́ iwaàdí inú òṣùpá rẹ̀ oon Impact Probe (MIP) jáde, èyí tí ó sáré kọjá ojú òṣùpá ní ìwọ̀n kìlómítà kan ó lé márùn ún fún ìṣẹ́jú kan (ẹgbẹ̀rún mẹ́ta máìlì fún wákàtí kan) èyí tí ó se àseyọrí ìjálulẹ̀ lẹ́bàá ìhà gúùsù òṣùpá.

translation.en: Besides carrying three important scientific instruments, the lunar probe also carried the image of the Indian national flag, painted on all sides.
translation.yo: Pẹlu pe o n gbe irin iṣẹ sayẹnsi pataki mẹta, luna probi naa gbe aworan asia ilu Indiya ti a kun loju mejej.

translation.en: "Thanks for those who supported a convict like me," Siriporn was quoted as saying at a press conference.
translation.yo: “Mo dúpé lọ́wọ́ àwọn tó gbárùkù ti ẹlẹ́wọ̀n bíi tèmi,” Siriporn sọ bẹ́ẹ̀ níbi ìpadé àwọn oníwèé ìròyìn.

translation.en: "Some may not agree but I don't care.
translation.yo: “Àwọn kan lè má gbà, ṣùgbọn, kò kàn mí.

translation.en: I am happy that there are people willing to support me.
translation.yo: Inu mi dun pe awon eyan wa to fe durotimi.

translation.en: Since Pakistani independence from British rule in 1947, the Pakistani President has appointed "Political Agents" to govern FATA, who exercise near-complete autonomous control over the areas.
translation.yo: Láti ìgbà tí Pakistani ti gba òmìnira lọ́wọ́ ìjọba ilẹ̀ Gẹ̀ẹ́sì ni ọdún 1947, Ààrẹ orílẹ̀̀èdè Pakistani ti yan àwọn “aṣojú-ẹni nínú ìṣèlú” láti darí FATA, tí ó fẹ́rẹ̀ ẹ́ dá gbogbo orílẹ̀ èdè darí.

translation.en: These agents are responsible for providing government and judicial services under Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution.
translation.yo: Àwọn asojú wọ̀nyí jẹ́ ìdúró fún ìpèse ìjọba àti àwọn ẹka ìdájọ́ lábẹ́ abala òjìlénígba ó lé méje ìwé òfin ilẹ̀ Pakistan.

translation.en: A hostel collapsed in Mecca, the holy city of Islam at about 10 o'clock this morning local time.
translation.yo: Ibùgbé àwọn akẹ́ẹ̀kọ́ dà lulẹ̀ ní ìlú Mecca tó jẹ́ ìlú mímọ́ àwọn ẹlẹ́sìn Islam ní nǹkan bí i aago mẹ́wàá òwúrọ̀ yìí.

translation.en: The building housed a number of pilgrims who came to visit the holy city at the eve of hajj pilgrimage.
translation.yo: Ilé náà gba àwọn arìnrìnàjò tí wọ́n wá sí ilú mímọ́ ní alẹ́ ìrìnàjò hajj.

translation.en: The hostel's guests were mostly citizens of the United Arab Emirates.
translation.yo: Opo awon alejo ile itura naa ni won je omo ilu United Arab Emirate.

translation.en: The death toll is at least 15, a figure which is expected to rise.
translation.yo: Oye awon to ku, o kere ju, je 15, won de n reti pe o maa po sii.

translation.en: Leonov, also known as "cosmonaut No. 11", was part of the Soviet Union's original team of cosmonauts.
translation.yo: Leonov, tí a tún mọ̀ sí “cosmonaut No. 11”, jẹ́ ọ̀kan lára àpapọ̀ ẹgbẹ́̀ Soviet tí ó jẹ́ ẹgbẹ́ cosmonauts.

translation.en: On March 18, 1965, he performed the first manned extravehicular activity (EVA), or "spacewalk", remaining alone outside the spacecraft for just over twelve minutes.
translation.yo: Ni ojo kejidinlogun osu keta, odun 1965, o se afihan ohun irinna akoko manned extravehicular activity (EVA), or “spacewalk”, o da wa ni ita baalu naa fun bi iseju aya mejila.

translation.en: He received the "Hero of the Soviet Union", the Soviet Union's highest honor, for his work.
translation.yo: O gba “Akọni Soviet Union” oyè tó ga jú ní Soviet Union, fún iṣẹ́ rẹ̀.

translation.en: Ten years later, he led the Soviet part of the Apollo–Soyuz mission symbolizing that the Space Race was over.
translation.yo: Lẹ́yìn ọdún mẹ́wáá ó padà darí apá ikọ̀ Apollo-Soyuz ní àfihàn pé eré ìje Space Race ti pari.

translation.en: She said, "There is no intelligence to suggest that an attack is expected imminently.
translation.yo: Arábìnrin náà sọ wípé “Kò sí ìtalólobó kankan tó tọ́ka sí wípé àkọlù jẹ ohun ti à ń retí láìpẹ́.

translation.en: However, the reduction of the threat level to severe does not mean the overall threat has gone away."
translation.yo: Sugbon bi oye ihale se dinku si abala kekere ko tumo si wile gbogbo ihale ti kuro.”

translation.en: While authorities are unsure of the credibility of the threat, the Maryland Transportaion Authority made the closure with the urging of the FBI.
translation.yo: Níbí àwọn aláṣẹ́ ò se mọ̀ bí ìdúnkokò náà se múnlẹ̀ tó, Àwọn Aláṣẹ ìrìnlọrìnbọ̀ Mérìlandì ti kéde pẹ̀lu rírọ iléeṣẹ́ FBI.

translation.en: Dump trucks were used to block tube entrances and assistance of 80 police were on hand to direct motorists to detours.
translation.yo: Wọ́n m a n fi ọkọ̀ ti won fi n ko ìdọ̀tí láti fi dína ọ̀nà abáwọlé tiubi àti ìrànlọ́wọ́ awon eyan 80 ti o ti gbaradi láti dari àwọn awokọ̀ si àyàbá iwájú.

translation.en: There were no heavy traffic delays reported on the beltway, the city's alternate route.
translation.yo: Ko sí ìdádúró súnkẹrẹfàkẹrẹ púpọ̀ lóri ojú ọ̀nà ìdèkùn,ọ̀nà ìkejí ìlú náà.

translation.en: Nigeria previously announced it planned to join the AfCFTA in the week leading up to the summit.
translation.yo: Orílèèdè Nigeria ti kéde sáájú pé òun pèrò àti darapọ̀ mọ́ AfCFTA láàrin ọ̀sẹ̀, èyí tí yíó yọrí sí àpérò.

translation.en: AU trade and industry commissioner Albert Muchanga announced Benin was to join.
translation.yo: Kọmíṣọ́nà ilé iṣẹ́ àti ìtajà AU Albert Muchanga kéde pé Benin ma darapọ̀.

translation.en: The commissioner said, "We haven't yet agreed on rules of origin and tariff con[c]essions, but the framework we have is enough to start trading on July 1, 2020".
translation.yo: Kọmíṣánà sọ pé, a kò ì tí ì fi ẹnu kò lórí òfin ìpẹ̀lẹ̀ àti owó orí, ṣùgbọ́n ètò tí a ti gbé kalẹ̀ tó wa láti bẹ̀ẹ̀rẹ̀ káràkátà ní ọjọ́ kìíní, oṣù kéje, ọdún 2020” .

translation.en: The station maintained its attitude, despite the loss of a gyroscope earlier in the space station mission, until the end of the spacewalk.
translation.yo: Ibùdó náà kò sọ ìwà rẹ nù, pẹ̀lú bí o ṣe sọ gyroscope nù lẹ́ẹ̀kan ní ibùdó, títí di òpin spacewal.

translation.en: Chiao and Sharipov reported being a safe distance from the attitude adjustment thrusters.
translation.yo: Chiao àti Sharipov fi tónilétí pé ó dára láti jíjìnà sí ẹnjìni tí a mọ̀ sí attitude adjustment thruster.

translation.en: Russian ground control activated the jets and normal attitude of the station was regained.
translation.yo: Àdarí ilẹ̀ Russia ti tan àwọn jẹ́ẹ̀tì wọ́n sí ti gba ìwa ibùdó náà.

translation.en: The case was prosecuted in Virginia because it is the home to the leading internet service provider AOL, the company who instigated the charges.
translation.yo: Virginia ni wọ́n ti ṣe ẹjọ́ náà, nítorí ibẹ̀ ni ilé àwọn ile iṣẹ tó ń pèsè intanẹtì tí ó ga jùlọ tí a mọ̀ sí AOL wà, ilé iṣẹ́ tí ó bẹ̀rẹ̀ ìgbówólélórí.

translation.en: This is the first time a conviction has been gained using the legislation enacted in 2003 to curb bulk e-mail, aka spam, from unsolicited distribution into users mailboxes.
translation.yo: Igba akọkọ ree ti a ma ran eyan lọ si ẹwọn lati ofin ti a fi silẹ ni ọdun 2003 lati din imeeli gbogbogbo ti a tun pe ni spaami, lati awọn onibaara ti a o beere fun, si inu kolo meeli awọn to n lo imeeli.

translation.en: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City last year in January 2017 from Brazilian club Palmeiras for a reported fee of £27 million.
translation.yo: Jesu omo odun mokanlelogun darapo mo egbe agbabolu Manchester City lodun ti o koja ni osu kinni odun 2017 lati egbe agbabolu Palmeiras ni orile ede Brazil fun owo ti o to £27 million.

translation.en: Since then, the Brazilian has featured in 53 matches for the club in all competitions and has scored 24 goals.
translation.yo: Láti ìgbàyẹn, àwọn Brasili ti kópa ní eré 53 fún ẹgbẹ́ ní gbogbo ìdíje wọ́n dẹ̀ ti gbá goolu 24.

translation.en: Dr. Lee also expressed his concern about reports that children in Turkey have now become infected with the A(H5N1) avian influenza virus without becoming ill.
translation.yo: Dr.Lee náà fi ẹ̀dùn ọkàn hàn lórí ìrìyìn pé àwọn ọmọ tó wà ní ilẹ̀ Turkey ti kó kòkòrò A(H5N1) èyí tó jẹ́ ààrùn kòkòrò avian influenza láláì se àìsàn.

translation.en: Some studies suggest that the disease must become less lethal before it can cause a global epidemic, he noted.
translation.yo: Àwọn ìwádí mín sèwòye wípé àrùn náà gbọ́dọ̀ lọlẹ̀ kó tó di àjàkálẹ̀ àrùn tó kárí ayé.

translation.en: There is concern that patients may continue to infect more people by going through their daily routines if the flu symptoms remain mild.
translation.yo: Ìkọlóminú wà wípé àwọn aláìsàn lè máa kó àìsàn ran àwọn ènìyàn míràn nípa lilọ́ se àwọn iṣẹ́ òòjọ́ wọn tí kòkòrò náà bá sì wà nílẹ̀.

translation.en: Leslie Aun, a spokesperson for the Komen Foundation, said the organization adopted a new rule that does not allow grants or funding to be awarded to organizations that are under legal investigation.
translation.yo: Leslie Aun, tí ó jẹ́ agbẹnusọ àjọ Komen, sọ pé ẹgbẹ́ náà ti ní òfin tuntun tí kò fi ààyè gba fífún àwọn àjọ tí ó wà labẹ́ ìwádìí òfin ní owó-ìfiṣẹ̀rànwọ́-fún tàbí ẹ̀bù.

translation.en: Komen's policy disqualified Planned Parenthood due to a pending investigation on how Planned Parenthood spends and reports its money that is being conducted by Representative Cliff Stearns.
translation.yo: Ìlànà Komen yọ Ètò Òbí kúrò látàrí ìwádìí tọ́ ń lọ lọ́wọ́ bí Ètò Òbí ṣe náwó àti bí wọ́n ṣe jábọ̀ owó nípasẹ̀ Àṣójú Cliff Stearns.

translation.en: Stearns is investigating whether taxes are used to fund abortions through Planned Parenthood in his role as chairman of the Oversight and Investigations Subcommittee, which is under the umbrella of the House Energy and Commerce Committee.
translation.yo: Steni n wádi bóya wọn lo owó orí fún oyún ṣíṣẹ́ ní Ìlànà Òbí ní ipò rẹ̀ gẹ́gẹ́ bi alága Igbimo Ofasaiti àti Ìwádi, tó wà lábẹ̀ àsíya Igbimo Agbára àti Iṣòwò.

translation.en: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican Party presidential primary election on Tuesday with over 46 percent of the vote.
translation.yo: Gómínà Massachusetts ní ìgbà kan rí, Mitt Romney gbé igbá orókè nínú ètò ìdìbò ẹgbẹ Republican ti ilẹ̀ Florida láti díje fún ipò ààrẹ ní ọjọ́ ìṣẹ́gun pẹ̀lú ìwọn ìdá mẹ́rìndínláàdọ́ta ìbo.

translation.en: Former U.S. Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent.
translation.yo: Ẹni tí ó ti fìgbà kan jẹ́ abẹnugan ilé nílẹ̀ U.S, Newt Gingrich ló gbé ipò kejì pẹ̀lú ìdá méjìlélọ́gbọ̀n.

translation.en: As a winner-takes-all state, Florida awarded all fifty of its delegates to Romney, pushing him ahead as the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.
translation.yo: Gẹ́gẹ́ bíi ilú onípòkíní-gba-gbogbo-rẹ̀, ìlú Florida rán èyàn aadọ́ta lọsí Romni, èyí tìí síwájú ní eré ìbò Ẹgbẹ́ Òmìnir.

translation.en: Organisers of the protest said about 100,000 people turned up in German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, and Hanover.
translation.yo: Àwọn agbátẹrù ìfẹ̀hónúhàn ní àwọn èèyàn tó ju ọgọ́rùn ún ẹgbẹ̀rún kan ni o jáde ní àwọn ìlú German bí i Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, àti Hanover.
